name: All A Board
description:
Note: You'll need to enable hardware acceleration in your browser for good performance!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/all-a-board

How to play:

Progress through a series of minecart track loops by defeating the cardboard cutout enemies hidden within them. Use slow-motion to aim and shoot while on the run-away minecart and find rice balls throughout the mine to refill your slow-motion time. Can you escape the mine?

Controls:
Move mouse to aim.
Hold right-click to engage slow-motion. 
Left-click to shoot.
